GameObject
Class Player

java.lang.Object
  GameObject.GameObject
      GameObject.MovableObject
          GameObject.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Player
extends MovableObject
implements java.io.Serializable

Used to represent the Player object on the Game Grid. The Player class inherits most of its functionality from MovableObject, but it also implements the logic that enables the user to interact with GamePlay. Specifically, the player class defines the logic for: dropping bombs, activating powerUps, and detonating bombs. It is also the final link in the keyPressed and keyReleased chain during the GamePlay state, which starts with the GameStateManager.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Initialize a Player object representing the Bomberman character on the grid

posY - int representing the y coordinate where the player will be drawn
visible - boolean specifying whether the player object should be drawn

detonateLastBomb

public void detonateLastBomb()
Detonates the oldest bomb object placed by the player.

incrementSpeed

public void incrementSpeed()
Increment the speed of the player from its default of 'NORMALSPEED' to 'FASTSPEED'. Called upon picking up the Speed PowerUp.

death

public void death()
Disable the visibility of the player so that it is not drawn on the grid. Decrease the number of lives remaining by one.

countDownToRespawn

public void countDownToRespawn()
Count down 60 frames before displaying the player object again. Reset the position of the player object to the top-left corner of the tilemap.

decrementLivesRemaining

public void decrementLivesRemaining()
Reduces the number of lives the player has remaining by 1.

updateInvincibilityTimer

public void updateInvincibilityTimer()
Timer used to keep track of the duration of the invincibility powerUp. Upon coming in contact with the powerUp, the player becomes immune to the collisions with enemies and flames.

enablePowerUp

public void enablePowerUp(PowerUpType powerUpType)
Based on the PowerUpType passed to this method, we modify gameplay logic according to the specific functionality of the corresponding powerUp.

Parameters:
powerUpType -

disablePowerUpsOnDeath

public void disablePowerUpsOnDeath()
Disable the powerUps on the player object that are lost upon death.

nextStage

public void nextStage()
Reset the position of the player to the top-left corner of the map. Called upon advancing to the next stage (killing all the enemies and touching the door).

keyPressed

public void keyPressed(int key)
Move the player object if the arrow keys are pressed. Place a bomb if the x key is pressed. Detonate a bomb if the z key is pressed. Enter the in-game menu if the space bar is pressed.

Parameters:
key - KeyCode used to represent the key pressed on the keyboard.

keyReleased

public void keyReleased(int key)
Stop moving the player object upon releasing the arrow keys.

Parameters:
key -

incrementBombsAllowed

public void incrementBombsAllowed()
Increments the number of bombs the player is allowed to place on the grid by one. The maximum number of bombs the player can put at a time is 10. Used by the Bombs powerUp.
